snippet.title: U.S. Navy Fighters - Intro and first campaign mission: Eviction Notice
snippet.description:
Intro and first mission of the Ukraine Campaign from U.S. Navy Fighters flight sim game, designed by Brent Iverson of Chuck Yeager's Air Combat  and LHX Attack Chopper fame. 

Game was developed and published by Electronic Arts, released in 1994 for MS-DOS, and being one of the first games that featured up to 1024x768 SVGA graphics. Although no system at that time could run the game at that resolution with max settings and reasonable frame rate.

It was first in the series of "light " flight sims which included:
• Marine Fighters (USNF expansion)
• U.S.Navy Fighters Gold (USNF + MF)
--------frome here released under Jane's brand------
• Advanced Tactical Fighters
• Nato Fighters (ATF expansion)
--------from here released only for Windows----------
• U.S. Navy Fighters '97 (USNF Gold + Vietnam Campaign)
• U.S. Navy Fighters Final Mission - rare Japanese release which added Japan Campaign
• Advanced Tactical Fighters Gold (ATF + NF)
• Fighters Anthology (USNF'97 + ATF Gold)*

*on first CD of Fighters Anthology, you can find full version of LHX Attack Chopper as an undocumented bonus!

Software used:
• DOSBox 0.74
• CoolSoft's Virtual Midi Synth with Timbres Of Heaven GM_GS_XG_SFX V 3.2 Final soundfont for MIDI music emulation
• NVidia's Shadowplay for Full HD @ 60FPS video recording

Ukraine campaign videos fix for Fighters Anthology: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1F71t10t4iwPTk1-bcwanLz75ftT0Y0Om

Full playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIku_oD9y-RAlU24oJM8MD70jgAYqz4el

#RetroFlightSims
